news.title: I met a lot of weird robots at CES — here are the most memorable
news.summary: If the robots don't always give a totally accurate representation of where commercial deployment is at the moment, they do give visitors a peek at where their parent companies might be headed.

news.title: Google moonshot spinout SandboxAQ claims an ex-exec is attempting ‘extortion’
news.summary: A former SandboxAQ executive filed a wrongful termination lawsuit filled with shocking allegations. The company is fighting back, hard.

news.title: CES 2026: Everything revealed, from Nvidia’s debuts to AMD’s new chips to Razer’s AI oddities
news.summary: CES 2026 is in full swing in Las Vegas, with the show floor open to the public after a packed couple of days occupied by press conferences from the likes of Nvidia, Sony, and AMD and previews from Sunday’s Unveiled event.

news.title: How the Sleepbuds maker, Ozlo, is building a platform for sleep data
news.summary: Ozlo Sleepbuds are going to have a big year, with new products, AI features, and more.

news.title: Meta signs deals with three nuclear companies for 6-plus GW of power
news.summary: Two smaller companies, Oklo and TerraPower, along with Vistra, a large energy company, just signed agreements with Meta.

news.title: Betterment’s financial app sends customers a $10,000 crypto scam message
news.summary: Betterment, a financial app, sent a sketchy-looking notification on Friday asking users to send $10,000 to Bitcoin and Ethereum crypto wallets and promising to "triple your crypto," according to a thread on Reddit. news.title: Amazon is planning a Super Amazon-mart store near Chicago
news.summary: Amazon could be taking another, even bigger swing at physical stores, this time with a Walmart-like supercenter. news.title: X accuses music publishers of ‘weaponizing’ DMCA takedowns
news.summary: X is suing music publishers and their trade group, the National Music Publishers' Association (NMPA), accusing them of attempted coercion in their ongoing battle over licensing, as reported earlier by The Hollywood Reporter. news.title: This company could help bring Auracast to an iPhone near you
news.summary: One of the issues holding Auracast back from wider mainstream use is some companies' lack of support for the Bluetooth technology - Apple being a prime example. news.summary: Including previous approvals, Starlink can now deploy 15,000 Gen2 satellites.
